languages.text: "Прежние... договоренности... не имеют более над вами силу, Вольный Торговец". {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки до побелевших костяшек.{/n} "Советую в дальнейшем содействовать трибуналу, если только вы не хотите как можно скорее оказаться на плахе".

traits.locale_text: "Прежние... договоренности... не имеют более над вами силу, Вольный Торговец". {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки до побелевших костяшек.{/n} "Советую в дальнейшем содействовать трибуналу, если только вы не хотите как можно скорее оказаться на плахе".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."
languages.original_text: "Прежние... договоренности... не имеют более над вами силу, Вольный Торговец". {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки до побелевших костяшек.{/n} "Советую в дальнейшем содействовать трибуналу, если только вы не хотите как можно скорее оказаться на плахе".

traits.locale_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix balls his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court, unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix balls his fists so hard, the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix balls his fists so hard, the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Les précédents... arrangements... ne s'appliquent plus à vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Heinrix serre les poings tellement fort que ses jointures blanchissent.{/n} « Je vous conseille de coopérer avec la cour si vous ne souhaitez pas finir sur l'échafaud dans les plus brefs délais. »
languages.original_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: « Les précédents... arrangements... ne s'appliquent plus à vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Heinrix serre les poings tellement forts que ses jointures blanchissent.{/n} « Je vous conseille de coopérer avec la cour si vous ne souhaitez pas finir sur l'échafaud dans les plus brefs délais. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “之前的……安排……已经失效了，行商浪人。”{n}海因里希狠狠地捶了一拳，连指关节都捏得发白。{/n}“我建议你保持合作态度，除非你打算现在就上断头台。”
languages.original_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: “之前的……安排……已经失效了，行商浪人。”{n}海因里希狠狠地捶了一拳，连指关节都捏得发白。{/n}“我建议你保持合作态度，除非你打算现在就上断头台。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「以前の…取り決めは…もはやあなたには適用されないぞ、自由開拓者」{n}ハインリックスは指の関節が白くなるほど拳を強く握りしめる。{/n}「本法廷に協力するよう忠告する。早々に死刑台に上がりたくなければな」
languages.original_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: 「以前の…取り決めは…もはやあなたには適用されないぞ、自由開拓者」{n}ハインリックスは指の関節が白くなるほど拳を強く握りしめる。{/n}「本法廷に協力するよう忠告する。早々に死刑台に上がりたくなければな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Die früheren ... Vereinbarungen ... gelten für Euch nicht länger, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Heinrix ballt mit aller Kraft die Fäuste, bis seine Knöchel weiß werden.{/n} "Ich rate Euch, mit dem Hof zu kooperieren, wenn Ihr nicht so schnell wie möglich auf dem Schafott landen wollt."
languages.original_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Die früheren ... Vereinbarungen ... gelten für Euch nicht länger, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Heinrix ballt mit aller Kraft die Fäuste, bis seine Knöchel weiß werden.{/n} "Ich rate Euch, mit dem Hof zu kooperieren, wenn Ihr nicht so schnell wie möglich auf dem Schafott landen wollt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sus ... acuerdos previos... ya no proceden, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños con tanta fuerza que sus nudillos se ponen blancos.{/n} «Le recomiendo que coopere con este tribunal si no quiere acabar en el cadalso a la primera de cambio».
languages.original_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: «Sus ... acuerdos previos... ya no proceden, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños con tanta fuerza que sus nudillos se ponen blancos.{/n} «Le recomiendo que coopere con este tribunal si no quiere acabar en el cadalso a la primera de cambio».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Önceki düzenlemeler sen özelinde artık geçersiz Hür Tacir." {n}Heinrix, yumruklarını o kadar sert sıkıyor ki parmaklarının boğumları beyaza dönüyor.{/n} "İlk fırsatta kendini darağacında bulmak istemiyorsan divan ile iş birliği yapmanı tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "The previous... arrangements... no longer apply to you, Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n} "I advise you to cooperate with the court unless you want to end up on the scaffold at the earliest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Önceki düzenlemeler senin için artık geçerli değil Hür Tacir." {n}Heinrix yumruklarını o kadar sert sıkıyor ki parmaklarının boğumları beyaza dönüyor.{/n} "İlk fırsatta kendini darağacında bulmak istemiyorsan divan ile iş birliği yapmanı tavsiye ederim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
